item.name: Retrieves account details by account ID.

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the account to retrieve.

request.description:
This API endpoint retrieves details of an account based on the provided account ID.
It is accessible to authorized users and returns the account details if the account exists.

item.name: Creates a new account for a client.

request.description:
This API endpoint allows an admin to create a new account for a client.
The request must include the account number, and account type.

item.name: Deletes an existing client account by ID.

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the account to delete.

request.description:
This API endpoint allows an admin to delete a client account based on the provided account ID.
If the account is the only one associated with the client, it cannot be deleted.

item.name: Retrieves details of a specific client by ID.

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the client to retrieve.

request.description:
This endpoint retrieves details of a specific client based on the provided client ID.
It is accessible to authorized hub users.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: This endpoint allows an admin to create a new client. The request must include all necessary client information, including: Email: The client's email address. Must be valid and unique.FirstName: The client's first name. Maximum length is 60 characters.LastName: The client's last name. Maximum length is 60 characters.PersonalId: The client's personal ID (e.g., national ID). Must be exactly 11 characters.ProfilePhoto: The client's profile photo. Must be a valid file.MobileNumber: The client's mobile number. Must be in international format (e.g., +971501234567) and unique.Gender: The client's gender. Accepted values are 0 for Male and 1 for Female.CountryId: The ID of the country where the client resides. Must be a valid country ID.CityId: The ID of the city where the client resides. Must be a valid city ID associated with the specified country.Street: The street address of the client. Cannot be empty.ZipCode: The zip code of the client's address. Cannot be empty.AccountNumber: The client's account number. Must be unique and cannot be empty.AccountType: The type of the client's account. Valid values are between 0 and 10.

item.name: Registers a new user for the Hub.

request.description: This endpoint allows for the registration of a new Hub user by providing necessary details such as email, password, first name, last name, and role.

response.name: Successfully registered the user. Returns the user's login details, including a JWT token.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

response.name: Registration failed due to validation errors or if the email is already in use.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.name: Authenticates a Hub user and returns a JWT token upon successful login.

request.description: This endpoint verifies the user's credentials (email and password) and issues a JWT token if the login is successful.

response.name: Successfully authenticated the user. Returns the user's login details, including a JWT token.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

response.name: Login failed due to validation errors or incorrect credentials.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

response.name: An unexpected error occurred on the server.
